title: How to Make Paper in Little Alchemy 1 and 2: Complete Recipe

steps.title: Wood + Pressure = Paper.
steps.content: Wood + Pressure = Paper. This is the final combination to create this element. [1] X Research source If you're starting from the beginning, here's the fastest way to make Paper: Water + Earth = Mud Water + Air = Rain Earth + Rain = Plant Mud + Plant = Swamp Air + Fire = Energy Swamp + Energy = Life Earth + Life = Human Earth + Fire = Lava Air + Lava = Stone Fire + Stone = Metal Human + Metal = Tool Stone + Air = Sand Fire + Sand = Glass Sand + Glass = Time Plant + Time = Tree Tool + Tree = Wood Earth + Earth = Pressure Wood + Pressure = Paper

steps.title: Wood + Water = Paper.
steps.content: Wood + Water = Paper. Alternatively, you can combine Wood with Pressure, Blender, or Machine to create paper. If you're starting from the very beginning, here's the fastest way to make Paper: With Time : Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial soup Primordial soup + Time = Life Earth + Life = Soil Life + Soil = Plant Plant + Time = Tree Air + Air = Pressure Earth + Pressure = Stone Stone + Fire = Metal Stone + Metal = Blade Blade + Metal = Sword Tree + Sword = Wood Wood + Water = Paper Without Time : Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial soup Fire + Fire = Energy Primordial soup + Energy = Life Earth + Life = Soil Life + Soil = Plant Earth + Earth = Land Land + Land = Continent Continent + Continent = Planet Water + Earth = Mud Air + Air = Pressure Earth + Pressure = Stone Mud + Stone = Clay Clay + Life = Human Stone + Air = Sand Sand + Fire = Glass Planet + Fire = Sun Sun + Energy = Solar cell Solar cell + Sun = Electricity Glass + Electricity = Light bulb Human + Light bulb = Idea Human + Idea = Philosophy Planet + Philosophy = Big Plant + Big = Tree Stone + Fire = Metal Stone + Metal = Blade Blade + Metal = Sword Tree + Sword = Wood Wood + Water = Paper

steps.title: Paper recipes will vary slightly between Little Alchemy 1 and 2.
steps.content: Paper recipes will vary slightly between Little Alchemy 1 and 2. Be sure to use the recipes for the version you're using. Little Alchemy 1 : Paper + Engineer = Blueprint Paper + Wood/Story = Book Paper + Tobacco = Cigarette Paper + Blade/Scissors = Confetti Paper + Cookie = Fortune cookie Paper + Wind/Sky = Kite Paper + Pencil = Letter Paper + Earth = Map Paper + Gold = Money Paper + Paper = Newspaper Paper + Bird = Origami Paper + Airplane = Paper airplane Paper + Computer = Printer Paper + Flour/Baker = Recipe Paper + Sand = Sandpaper Paper + Music = Sheet music Paper + Gift = Wrapping paper Little Alchemy 2 : Paper + Fire/Campfire = Ash Paper + Legend/Wood = Book Paper + Tobacco = Cigarette Paper + Scissors/Blade = Confetti Paper + Cookie/Cookie dough/Gingerbread man = Fortune cookie Paper + Wind/Sky/Air = Kite Paper + Pencil = Letter Paper + Land, Hill, Mountain, Mountain range, Continent, Ocean, Sea, Lake, River, City, Village = Map Paper + Gold/Diamond/Bank = Money Paper + Paper/Story = Newspaper Paper + Bird, Animal, Eagle, Seagull, Owl, Pigeon, Cow, Horse, Dog, Cat, Lion, Hummingbird, Chicken, Penguin, Duck, Vulture = Origami Paper + Airplane = Paper airplane Paper + Cup = Paper cup Paper + Computer = Printer Paper + Flour, Meat, Baker, Bakery, Vegetable, Fruit, Cook = Recipe Paper + Sand = Sandpaper Paper + Blade/Sword = Scissors Paper + Music = Sheet music Paper + Gift, Christmas tree, Christmas stocking, Santa = Wrapping paper
